Text: Well you're not supposed to ruin events for people in the comment box first off. Second off, how much do you actually know about MMA, because Werdum is not a "washed up" fighter by any means and neither was Fedor. 28 wins is one fucking hell of a streak for Fedor and I largely consider his Strikeforce opponents second only to UFC as the best in the world. And Werdum is considered the #2 heavyweight in the world, he's the only man to beat both of the Emelianenko brothers
